SEARCH
Package com.quantum.ui.event

Class QEMouseActionListener

java.lang.Object
com.quantum.ui.event.QEAbstractListener
com.quantum.ui.event.QEMouseActionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLFWMouseButtonCallbackI, CallbackI, Pointer
public non-sealed class QEMouseActionListener extends QEAbstractListener implements GLFWMouseButtonCallbackI
Provides an abstraction layer for handling mouse button events by implementing GLFWMouseButtonCallbackI.

This class abstracts the handling of mouse button events from GLFW by implementing GLFWMouseButtonCallbackI and converting the raw GLFW mouse button events into higher-level QEMouseEvent objects. It simplifies the interaction with GLFW by providing isPressed(QEMouseEvent) and isReleased(QEMouseEvent) methods that are easier to use and extend for custom event handling.

In detail:

  • invoke(long, int, int, int): Processes raw mouse button events from GLFW. Based on the action (button press or release), it delegates the event to either isPressed(QEMouseEvent) or isReleased(QEMouseEvent).
  • isPressed(QEMouseEvent): Intended to be overridden to handle mouse button press events in a custom manner.
  • isReleased(QEMouseEvent): Intended to be overridden to handle mouse button release events in a custom manner.

Example usage:

 
 
 glfwSetMouseButtonCallback(window, new MyMouseListener() {
 
     @Override
     public void isPressed(QEMouseEvent e) {
          //Handle mouse button press
     }

     @Override
     public void isReleased(QEMouseEvent e) {
          //Handle mouse button release
     }
 
 });
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
RAZANAKOLONA Erwan-Matthieu Liantsoa

  • Constructor Details

    • QEMouseActionListener

      public QEMouseActionListener()

  • Method Details

    • invoke

      public void invoke(long window, int button, int action, int mods)
      Handles raw mouse button events from GLFW and delegates them to the appropriate method based on the action (button press or release). This method converts GLFW-specific events into higher-level QEMouseEvent objects.
      Specified by:
      invoke in interface GLFWMouseButtonCallbackI
      Parameters:
      window - The handle to the window where the event occurred.
      button - The mouse button code that was pressed or released.
      action - The action of the event (GLFW_PRESS or GLFW_RELEASE).
      mods - A bitfield representing the modifier keys that were active.
      Since:
      1.0

    • isReleased

      public void isReleased(QEMouseEvent e)
      Called when a mouse button is pressed. This method can be overridden to provide custom handling for mouse button press events at a higher abstraction level.
      Parameters:
      e - The QEMouseEvent representing the mouse button press event.
      Since:
      1.0

    • isPressed

      public void isPressed(QEMouseEvent e)
      Called when a mouse button is released. This method can be overridden to provide custom handling for mouse button release events at a higher abstraction level.
      Parameters:
      e - The QEMouseEvent representing the mouse button release event.
      Since:
      1.0
